hadith.text: Muhammad bin Abdullah bin As-Saib narrated from his father that:he used to lead Ib Abbas and make him stand at the third side (of the Kabah next to the corner that is next to the stone, in between the stone and the door. Ibn Abbas said: "Have you head that the Messenger of Allah used to pray here?" He said: "Yes." So he went forward and prayed. (Daif) Chaper 134. The Virtue Of Circumambulationg The House, Which Is From The Book Al-Mujtaba About Hajj
